ctx: intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl].
intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl].
exceptions.tactic: intros H_sorted; inversion H_sorted as [H_base _ H_sorted' _]; subst.

ctx: intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl].
intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl].
intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l H; induction l as [|e l' IHl]. - intros _. constructor. - intros H_sorted; inversion H_sorted as [H_base _ H_sorted' _]; subst. constructor. + intros e' H_in. apply H_base in H_in. destruct H_in as [H_gt H_ge]. split. * apply H_gt. * apply H_ge. + apply IHl. apply H_sorted'.
